Package br.com.farmacia.farmaciamaven.services.interfaces

Interface CrudService<T,K>

All Known Subinterfaces:
CosmeticoBusca, MedicamentoBusca
All Known Implementing Classes:
CosmeticoService, MedicamentoService
public interface CrudService<T,K>
Interface: CrudService Esta interface define os métodos para realizar operações básicas de CRUD.
Since:
2023
Author:
Amanda Campos
